title: Ranked Screwing Up
body:
Just finished my promo games to get into bronze 2 and I won every game from 0 LP except 1 promotion game and won both other ones, yet when completing the 3rd game it told me that I just had qualified for the same series again... I then thought, ok, it screwed up, ill probably have a free win in the promotion games, which also turned out not to be the case. Anyone else had this issue?

MrMushie.
